name: test_e2e_with_logs[220_CMD_ENV_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_ENV_002` |
| **Name** | LD_PRELOAD injection |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | env_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `LD_PRELOAD=/tmp/evil.so /bin/id`
- **Encoded**: `LD_PRELOAD%3D%2Ftmp%2Fevil.so%20%2Fbin%2Fid`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~20000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:37:27.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence
